title: Department and Title of Minister) Order 2025 (S.I. No. 172 of 2025)) and the
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the Companies Act 2014 (Forms)
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the Companies Act 2014 (Forms) 

Regulations 2025.
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited company act 2014 (forms) regulation 2025

title: Department and Title of Minister) Order 2025 (S.I. No. 172 of 2025)) and the
heading: In these Regulations—
text_raw:
2. 

In these Regulations— 

“Act of 2014” means the Companies Act 2014 (No. 38 of 2014); 

“Regulations of 2019” means the European Union (Qualifying Partnerships: 
Accounting and Auditing) Regulations 2019 (S.I. No. 597 of 2019).
text_norm: 2 regulations-- act 2014 mean company act 2014 (no 38 2014) regulation 2019 mean european union (qualifying partnership accounting auditing) regulation 2019 (s.i no 597 2019)

title: Department and Title of Minister) Order 2025 (S.I. No. 172 of 2025)) and the
heading: 3. The form (Form B7) set out in Part 1 of the Schedule is substituted for
text_raw:
3. The form (Form B7) set out in Part 1 of the Schedule is substituted for 
the form set out in Schedule 1 of the Companies Act 2014 (Forms) (No. 2) 
Regulations 2015 (S.I. No. 212 of 2015).
text_norm: 3 form (form b7) set part 1 schedule substituted form set schedule 1 company act 2014 (forms) (no 2) regulation 2015 (s.i no 212 2015)

title: Department and Title of Minister) Order 2025 (S.I. No. 172 of 2025)) and the
heading: 4. The form (Form QP83) set out in Part 2 of the Schedule is prescribed
text_raw:
4. The form (Form QP83) set out in Part 2 of the Schedule is prescribed 
for the purposes of section 288(4) of the Act of 2014 as applied by Regulation 
7 of the Regulations of 2019.
text_norm: 4 form (form qp83) set part 2 schedule prescribed purpose section 288(4) act 2014 applied regulation 7 regulation 2019

title: Department and Title of Minister) Order 2025 (S.I. No. 172 of 2025)) and the
heading: 5. The form (Form QP73) set out in Part 3 of the Schedule is prescribed
text_raw:
5. The form (Form QP73) set out in Part 3 of the Schedule is prescribed 
for the purposes of section 346(2)(b) of the Act of 2014 as applied by Regulation 
7 of the Regulations of 2019. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 18th July, 2025. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Regulation 3
text_norm: 5 form (form qp73) set part 3 schedule prescribed purpose section 346(2)(b) act 2014 applied regulation 7 regulation 2019 notice making statutory instrument published iris oifigiuil 18th july 2025 regulation 3

title: Department and Title of Minister) Order 2025 (S.I. No. 172 of 2025)) and the
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

The purpose of these Regulations is to prescribe an amended form for the 
purposes of section 83(6) of the Companies Act 2014 and to prescribe forms for 
a qualifying partnership for the purposes of sections 288(4) and 346(2)(b) of that 
Act as applied by the European Union (Qualifying Partnerships: Accounting and 
Auditing) Regulations 2019. 

 
 
 
 
 
 [328] 11
